Title: Application and package management using Helm - Learn
Description: Helm is an application package manager for Kubernetes that you use to standardize and simplify the deployment of cloud-native applications on Kubernetes. Here you'll see how to install third-party packages called Helm charts and how to create and install Helm charts for the workloads your teams develop.

Title: A top audio engineer explains NPR’s signature sound

Title: QUIC and HTTP/3 Support now in Firefox Nightly and Beta – Mozilla Hacks - the Web developer blog
Description: Support for QUIC and HTTP/3 is now enabled by default in Firefox Nightly and Firefox Beta. HTTP/3 will be available by the end of May.

Title: My Go Executable Files Are Still Getting Larger (What's New in 2021 and Go 1.16)
Description: Two years ago, I wrote about how to utilize D3 and a tree map visualization to explore the size of executable files produced by the Go compiler. Sadly, the situation is even worse now than it was back in 2019.
